column1: # SolarForecastArbiter Reference sites
# This file contains metadata for SolarForecastArbiter reference observation sites.
# It includes Arbiter specific metadata fields as well as fields which will be stored
# in `extra_parameters` to be used by fetching code when requesting new data for that
# site.
# Field descriptions:
# interval_length (required): The length of between each measurement.
# name (required) : A human readable name for the site.
# latitude (required) : Latitude in degrees North of the equator.
# longitude (required) : Longitude in degrees East of the Prime meridian.
# elevation (required) : Elevation above sea level in meters.
# NOTE: `network_api_id` and `network_api_abbreviation` are not strictly defined
#       must be consistent throughout a given network to function properly.
#       For example
column2: University of Oregon's SRML data organizes data by a two letter

column1: #       abbreviation on their file server
column2: while their files contain a 5 digit float

column1: #       to identify their location.
# network_api_id : An alphanumeric code used by the network to identify the site.
# network_api_abbreviation : A text abbreviation used by the network to label the site.
# timezone (required) : A timezone allowable by the SolarForecastArbiter API.
# attribution: A field for including an attribution for the observation data at this site.
# network (required) : The name of the network Providing the data.
interval_length
